sentences.en: But just as with software, GMOs suffer from piracy.
sentences.cn: 但就像软件业遇到的状况一样, GMOs也会遭到侵权.

sentences.en: But would they if it contributed to software piracy?
sentences.cn: 但他们如果它有助于软件盗版?

sentences.en: Establishing and improving the framework of laws and rules on copyright piracy.
sentences.cn: 建立健全打击盗版的法律法规.

sentences.en: He no longer took an interest in war , nor even in piracy.
sentences.cn: 什么打仗啦,当海盗呀,他全无了兴趣.

sentences.en: I think they are 70 % is boat or watch for piracy boat.
sentences.cn: 我认为此处有70%的小船是海盗船或海盗的望风船.

sentences.en: It's estimated that China has an 82 % software piracy rate.
sentences.cn: 据估计,中国软件盗版率为82%.

sentences.en: Of course, piracy was not confined to the Caribbean.
sentences.cn: 当然, 海盗劫掠不仅限于加勒比地区.

sentences.en: Piracy of films and music, in particular, is rampant.
sentences.cn: 电影和音乐盗版现象尤为猖獗.

sentences.en: Seven of the fishermen have been formally charged with piracy.
sentences.cn: 其中7名渔夫因海盗行为遭正式起诉。

sentences.en: Sound trading relationships depend on partnership -- not piracy.
sentences.cn: 健康的贸易关系取决于夥伴关系, 而不是盗版.

sentences.en: The earliest international law but also on the decree against piracy.
sentences.cn: 最早的国际法中也包括了关于针对海盗的法令.

sentences.en: The rampant piracy makes providing content a difficult business.
sentences.cn: 疯狂的盗版,让内容提供成为一种难以做下去的业务.

sentences.en: They made the place a notorious centre of piracy.
sentences.cn: 他们把这地方变成了臭名昭著的海盗中心.

sentences.en: They were mere apprentices to piracy.
sentences.cn: 他们干海盗仅仅是嫩角儿.

sentences.en: We'll fight a fierce battle in the campaign against piracy.
sentences.cn: 我们要打一场打击盗版的大战.

words.tran_cn: 海盗的；非法翻印的，盗版的
海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者

trans.tran_cn: 海上抢劫，盗版行为，非法复制
trans.tran_en: the crime of illegally copying and selling books, tapes, videos, computer programs etc
